title: If i get Gold rank now do i still get the boarder or is it to late
body: If i get Gold rank now do i still get the boarder or is it to late

replies.body: too late my friend. The season is over. But climbing and practicing in pre-season can help with the start next season.

Incorrect. You get the border for whatever rank you CURRENTLY ARE. So if you reach gold in preseason you will be able to equip the gold border in ranked and normal queues. Season rewards however, aka icon and skin will reflect your rank from the 19th of november so you cannot receive this.
